title: [Wolves' Den, Kitchen]
description: The walls of the kitchen are lined with rotten cabinets and rusty iron cutlery.  A great stove and fire-pit sit in the center of the room, surrounded by wooden carving tables.  Passages lead off in several directions, and a chill draft blows up from the one leading down to the south.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, west, down
